HELLO
loan offer to business people.
You are in a financial bind and all attempts to regain control were a failure .It need money to grow your business. You had to explain late payments, loss of debt, divorce or job or another. This is not an impossible situation, or you might have a second chance at GLOBAL FINANCE. From now you can avail the loan of 10 thousand to 50 million .All funding for a well-defined project. If you are in need, please contact us.
e-mail: global_finance@laposte.net
thanks for your understanding

p.17,000 - Vykhino, Moskva, Russia

1 single room in 2-rooms flat.
metro Vykhino - 700 meters. Price - just 17 000 rubles (without other money, like deposits, commission, etc.)
Normal conditions, clean apartment. In other room - your neighbors - young couple.
Quiet area near the park and church. In the room: double bed, wardrobe, mirror, new window, etc. In the flat you can use washing machine, microwave, multicooker, oven. Toilet/bath separated. No balcony. No pets. Check-out date -  April 20.
Snaiperskaya Street

We are three people, Burt Bianca and Rudolph Kurzanov and me, we look for a flat in Moscow with 2 bedrooms,   for the 22 april, do you have a flat to rent for us ? 
Thank you :)

Three rooms flat near Mahane Yehuda market. Two bedrooms and a large living room with air-conditioning perfectly suit for a couple with a partner. The flat is completely furnished with washing machine, fridge and gas oven.The contract is till November 2016, 4500 a month

Dear Friends! The room is available to move in.
10 minutes to a subway (Kakhovskaya, Sevastopolskaya) on foot. Gym, bus route and park walking distance (good place for cycling fans). All stuff is available in a flat. Free wifi. 
Price with all bills included: 18 000 rub. 
Feel free to call me +7 903121 92 47.

You need a flat for short-term in Moscow in the end of April/beginning of May?

I rent out - for 1 or 2 weeks - this amazing loft-apartment (105 sq.m.) which has a panoramic view (metro Baumanskaya, 2 stations from Red square). Price can be discussed, especially if you agree to feed the cat ;-)

Contact me +79652434143

URGENT: Hi everyone ,
I am currently looking for a room in Moscow , near a subway if possible. I am a student and my I would need to accommodate myself for a period of 2 to 4 months starting june .
My budget is between 10 000 and 15 000 rubles.
I accept shared rooms , if indeed it has private lockers.
I will not be too demanding for my budget , but if you have anything to offer , please , please , let me know ;) Thank you

Friends ! Perhaps someone needs a good room for a short time, 2-3 months and more ‚Ä¶ !
COZY and QUIET ROOM will be available from 14 APRIL ! 
The room in located in an apartment of 70 sq.m. ( 3 rooms ) with a large hall, fully equipped kitchen and a clean bathroom.
The apartment is on the fourth floor in a building of only 5 floors with a lift; in an old green district of Moscow with well developed infratructure m. Polezhaevskaya ( line 7 purple color Tagansko ‚ÄìKrasnopresnenskaya ),only 3 stops from the ring and only 4 stops from the center Pushkinskaya.
From the m.Polezhaevskaya takes marshrutka or trolley buses and in 5 minutes you are at home in Demiana Bednogo ul.7. 
All questions in PM or via WhatsApp +39 345 3563801

Looking for a large room OR a small flat near the center of the city, or close to a red line, or purple line, metro station. Looking for a clean, furnished or semi-furnished place which at least includes a bed, refrigerator, stove/oven and washing machine. Interested in rooms or flats between 15000 - 30000 rubles.

Hey, Burt and me are looking for a flat, in Moscow like a small studio, 35000 max, help us :)
or just a room for 20 000 :)
S P A C I B A <3
